newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Smedvig, Statoil in ship contract.
newsitem.headline: Smedvig, Statoil in ship contract.

text.p: Norway's Smedvig ASA said on Monday it signed a letter of agreement with state-owned oil and gas company Statoil on a long term contract for drilling and for the completion of wells.
The contract will have a duration of five, eight or 10 years. Based on a five year term the contract's value is around 2.0 billion crowns, Smedvig said.
